p: To evaluate the difference between chemical composition on the adaxial and abaxial leaf surfaces, the SPME (solid phase microextraction)/GC-MS was carried out using the samples S6 and S7. The adaxial and abaxial surfaces were scraped and added into vials for extraction. The compounds identified are described in S2 Table, and the chromatograms are illustrated in Fig 3 and S4 Fig, respectively.
